installation.title: Installation
installation.odooVersion: Version 14.0 or higher (Community, Enterprise, or Odoo Online)
installation.step1Desc: Go to Odoo Integration for Gmail or search for "Odoo Integration for Gmail" in Chrome Web Store.
installation.step2Desc: Click the "Add to Chrome" button and review the permissions requested.
installation.step3Desc: You'll see a confirmation message and the extension icon will appear in your Chrome toolbar.
installation.step4Desc: Click the puzzle icon in Chrome toolbar, find "Odoo Integration for Gmail", and click the pin icon.
installation.noteDesc: If you see a message saying "This extension is not trusted by Enhanced Safe Browsing", this is normal for newly published extensions. The extension has been reviewed and approved by Chrome Web Store.

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.step1Desc: Navigate to mail.google.com and open any email to view the sidebar.
configuration.step2Desc: Enter your Odoo instance URL (e.g., https://yourcompany.odoo.com). Use HTTPS and don't include a trailing slash.
configuration.step3Desc: Log in to Odoo, go to Preferences, click Account Security tab, under API Keys click New API Key, give it a name, select Persistent Key, and copy the key.
configuration.step4Desc: Click Connect and the extension will verify your credentials.
configuration.updateDesc: To change your Odoo URL or API key:
configuration.updateStep1: Click the menu button (three vertical dots ⋮) in the sidebar

emailLogging.title: Email Logging
emailLogging.step1: Open the email you want to log
emailLogging.step2: View the contact in the sidebar
emailLogging.step3: Find the record you want to log to (opportunity, task, or ticket)
emailLogging.step4: Click the envelope icon next to the record
emailLogging.step5: The button changes to a green checkmark when logged
emailLogging.duplicateIntro: The extension has two layers of duplicate detection:
emailLogging.visualIndicatorDesc: Helps you identify at a glance which records already have this email
emailLogging.serverSideDesc: Odoo prevents duplicates even if the visual indicator has expired
emailLogging.importantDesc: Even without the visual indicator, you cannot accidentally create duplicates. Odoo's server validates every logging request and rejects duplicates.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Q: What Odoo versions are supported?
faq.a1: Odoo 14.0 and higher are supported, including Community, Enterprise, and Odoo Online (odoo.com).
faq.q2: Q: Does it work with other browsers?
faq.a2: Currently, the extension only supports Google Chrome. Support for other browsers may be added in the future.
faq.a3: Yes. The extension only accesses emails you actively view and communicates securely with your Odoo instance via HTTPS. Your API key is stored in Chrome's secure storage.
faq.q4: Q: What's the difference between FREE and PLUS?
faq.a4: FREE includes basic features (contact viewing, email logging, limited records). PLUS adds advanced search, financial insights, related contacts, and customization options.
faq.q5: Q: Can I cancel my PLUS subscription anytime?
faq.a5: Yes, you can cancel anytime without penalty. Your subscription will remain active until the end of your billing period.
faq.q6: Q: Does the extension read all my emails?
faq.a6: No, the extension only accesses emails you actively view. It does not scan your entire mailbox or read emails in the background.
faq.q7: Q: Is my API key stored securely?
faq.a7: Yes, your API key is stored in Chrome's secure storage (chrome.storage.sync), which Chrome encrypts using your OS user account credentials.

overview.title: Overview
overview.intro: Odoo Integration for Gmail ("the Extension") is committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how the Extension collects, uses, and protects your information.

infoCollect.title: Information We Collect
infoCollect.gmailDataDesc: The Extension accesses the following information from Gmail when you explicitly open an email:
infoCollect.senderRecipientDesc: Used to search for matching contacts in your Odoo instance
infoCollect.emailSubjectDesc: Used when you choose to create opportunities, tasks, or tickets in Odoo
infoCollect.emailDateDesc: Used for logging emails to Odoo records
infoCollect.odooDataDesc: The Extension retrieves the following information from your Odoo instance:
infoCollect.odooData1: Contact information (names, emails, phone numbers, companies)
infoCollect.configDataDesc: The Extension stores your Odoo instance configuration locally:

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.intro: The Extension uses your information solely for the following purposes:
howWeUse.displayContactDesc: Show relevant Odoo contact details in Gmail's sidebar
howWeUse.createRecordsDesc: When you click "Create" buttons, the email content is sent to your Odoo instance to create opportunities, tasks, or tickets
howWeUse.logEmailsDesc: When you click "Log Email" buttons, the email content is saved to your Odoo instance's chatter
howWeUse.searchFilterDesc: Search through opportunities, tasks, and tickets associated with contacts
howWeUse.cachingDesc: Temporarily cache Odoo API responses locally to improve performance

storage.title: Data Storage and Security
storage.localOnlyDesc: All data is stored locally on your device using Chrome's storage APIs. No data is transmitted to any third-party servers except your own Odoo instance.
storage.transmissionDesc: The Extension communicates directly with YOUR Odoo instance using HTTPS. Your Odoo credentials and data are never sent to the extension developer or any third party.
storage.cacheDesc: Cached data is automatically cleared after 5 minutes or when you click the refresh button. You can also clear all cached data by removing the extension.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.lemonIntro: The Extension uses LemonSqueezy (https://www.lemonsqueezy.com/) for subscription management and payment processing. When you subscribe to the PLUS plan, LemonSqueezy collects:
thirdParty.lemon1: Your email address for account management and receipts
thirdParty.lemon2: Payment information (processed securely, not stored by the Extension)
thirdParty.importantDesc: Payment data is handled entirely by LemonSqueezy. The Extension never receives or stores your credit card information.
thirdParty.inboxsdkDesc: The Extension uses InboxSDK (https://www.inboxsdk.com/) to integrate with Gmail's interface. InboxSDK is a library that helps the Extension interact with Gmail's UI to display the sidebar and detect email contacts. InboxSDK does not collect, transmit, or store your email data.

dataSharing.title: Third-Party Data Sharing
dataSharing.noShare: We do NOT share your data with any third parties for advertising, analytics, or data brokering purposes.
dataSharing.yourOdooDesc: The Extension sends API requests to the Odoo instance URL you configure to retrieve and create records
dataSharing.lemonDesc: Only for subscription management (email, subscription status, payment processing)
dataSharing.notSell: Sell your data to data brokers
dataSharing.notAnalytics: Transmit data to analytics or tracking services
dataSharing.notDeveloper: Send Gmail or Odoo data to the extension developer's servers

googleApi.title: Google API Services User Data Policy
googleApi.intro: Odoo Integration for Gmail's use and transfer of information received from Google APIs adheres to
googleApi.compliance1: The Extension only accesses Gmail data when you explicitly open an email
googleApi.compliance2: Email data is used exclusively for the disclosed purpose: integrating with your Odoo CRM
googleApi.compliance3: No Gmail data is used for serving advertisements
googleApi.compliance4: Gmail data is not transferred to third parties (except your own Odoo instance)
googleApi.compliance5: Gmail data is not used for determining creditworthiness or lending purposes

permissions.title: Permissions Explained
permissions.intro: The Extension requests the following Chrome permissions:
permissions.scripting: Required to inject the sidebar interface into Gmail
permissions.storage: Required to save your Odoo configuration and cache API responses locally
permissions.hostGmail: Required to access Gmail's interface and display the sidebar
permissions.hostOdoo: Required to communicate with Odoo Online cloud instances (e.g., yourcompany.odoo.com)
permissions.hostLemon: Required for subscription management and payment processing
permissions.optionalIntro: The Extension requests optional permissions for custom Odoo instances:
permissions.optionalDesc: Used ONLY if you connect to a self-hosted Odoo instance on a custom domain (e.g., odoo.yourcompany.com or erp.example.com). This permission is only requested when you explicitly configure a custom Odoo URL.
permissions.noteDesc: The Extension only supports HTTPS connections for security. HTTP connections are not allowed.
permissions.whenRequestedIntro: Chrome will prompt you to grant optional permissions when:
permissions.whenRequested1: You configure a custom Odoo URL that is not an *.odoo.com domain
permissions.whenRequested2: You explicitly choose to connect to a self-hosted Odoo instance
permissions.canDenyDesc: if you only use Odoo Online (*.odoo.com). The Extension will work normally with Odoo Online without granting optional permissions.
permissions.whyIntro: Many organizations host Odoo on their own servers with custom domains (e.g., erp.acme.com, odoo.mycompany.net). To support these users, the Extension requests optional broad permissions. However:
permissions.why1: These permissions are ONLY used to communicate with YOUR configured Odoo instance
permissions.why2: They are NEVER used to access other websites
permissions.why3: You can revoke them at any time in Chrome settings
permissions.why4: The Extension will only request them if you enter a custom Odoo URL

rights.title: Your Data Rights
rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your data:
rights.accessDesc: All your data is stored locally and in your Odoo instance, which you control
rights.deletionDesc: You can clear all Extension data by:
rights.deletion2: Removing the Extension from Chrome (clears all local data)
rights.portabilityDesc: Your data remains in your Odoo instance and is accessible via Odoo's export features
rights.controlDesc: You can revoke the Extension's access at any time by removing it

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.intro: The Extension retains data as follows:
retention.configDataDesc: Stored until you remove the Extension
retention.preferencesDesc: Stored until you remove the Extension
retention.uninstall: When you uninstall the Extension, all locally stored data is automatically removed by Chrome.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.desc: The Extension is not intended for use by children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.desc1: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify users of any material changes by updating the "Last updated" date at the top of this policy and, if required, through the Extension's update notifications.
changes.desc2: Continued use of the Extension after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated privacy policy.
